name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kipplo - A B2B Account Intelligence Platform

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kipplo offers users access to accurate and highly responsive business-to-business contacts of influential global decision-makers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🧩Our Chrome extension can revolutionize your team's prospecting efforts. It helps you locate the accurate 📲phone numbers and 📧 email addresses of your contacts and reduces the time spent on prospecting. 

🗞️Here are three simple steps to ensure how KIPPLO works:🗞️

➡Just sign up for KIPPLO and install the Chrome extension on your browser to get started.
➡After locating and monitoring potential business prospects on LinkedIn, add them to your KIPPLO dashboard.
➡You're good to go! Begin your pitch and business interactions with confidence. 

📥Download and install KIPPLO extension today and access free credits without any set-up cost and curate your ideal contact list and export them directly to your prospecting database. 

We offer a B2B database with 500+ million completely verified contacts.

✔️Our platform offers unparalleled flexibility in exporting contacts to your prospecting database with file formats seamlessly integrating with your in-house prospecting tool. With the ability to manage API keys and track shared contacts, you'll always have complete control and visibility. Adding multiple team members to your account is effortless without compromising your oversight. 

⭐Here’s what our clients have to say about us: ⭐
📌“It was so easy to find the contact I was looking for - all I had to do was type in their name on LinkedIn, and voila! I had their phone number and email address in a single view in just a few seconds.” 

📌“KIPPLO is a simple yet highly effective tool to increase your sales pipeline. I have personally booked numerous relationship meetings using it, which have resulted in successful sales. I highly recommend KIPPLO to teams who want to reduce their prospecting time.”
